channel.title: CVE Feed for ShapedPlugin LLC -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ShapedPlugin LLC -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-52124|2024-08-02T22:48:12.473Z -- shapedplugin%20llc -- wp%20tabs%20%E2%80%93%20responsive%20tabs%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ShapedPlugin LLC WP Tabs – Responsive Tabs Plugin for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Tabs – Responsive Tabs Plugin for WordPress: from n/a through 2.2.0.
